sentence: Full list of endorsements: Tanya Contreras Wheeless (AZ-04) Anna Paulina Luna (FL-13) Erin Houchin (IN-09) Annie Black (NV-04) Liz Joy (NY-20) Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (OH-13) Lori Chavez-DeRemer (OR-05) Morgan Ortagus (TN-05) Cassy Garcia (TX-28) Mayra Flores (TX-34)
author: Michael Ginsberg
title: Rep. Stefanik Announces New Round Of Endorsements For Female Republicans

sentence: The women endorsed by E-PAC on Tuesday included: Annie Black (Nev.-04) Lori Chavez-DeRemer (Ore.-05) Mayra Flores (Texas-34) Cassy Garcia (Texas-28) Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (Ohio-13) Erin Houchin (Ind.-09) Liz Joy (N.Y.-20) Anna Paulina Luna (Fla.-13) Morgan Ortagus (Tenn.-05) Tanya Contreras Wheeless (Ariz.-04) New "Women to Watch" 2022 E-PAC candidates included: Kalena Bruce (Mo.-04) Jessica De La Cruz (R.I.-02) Regan Deering (Ill.-13) Theresa Gavarone (Ohio-09) Barbara Kirkmeyer (Colo.-08) Jan Kulmann (Colo.-08) Catalina Lauf (Ill.-11) Cassandra Tanner Miller (Ill.-11) Yesli Vega (Va.-07) Sarah Walsh (Mo.-04) "I look forward to supporting these Rising Stars across the finish line in both their primaries and general elections.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Stefanik's E-PAC Endorses 10 More GOP Women for House

sentence: That's a lot of what we plan to do as well," said U.S. House candidate Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (R-OH).
author: Tara Mergener
title: GOP Predicts a 'Pink Wave' of Republican Women Heading to Congress This Fall

title: More Than 70 Percent Of Trump's Endorsees Believe The 2020 Election Was Fraudulent

sentence: The former president is set to headline a rally in Delaware, Ohio, this weekend featuring Mr. Vance and other candidates he has endorsed: Rep. Mike Carey, Max Miller and Madison Gesiotto Gilbert.
author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Original ‘Trumpers’ urge ex-president to rescind Vance endorsement in Ohio Senate race
